name: form-checkbox
title: Form Checkbox
description: A Checkbox input for selection of one or more items.

options.name: model
options.description: An array of String or Object values, (see return-object attribute).

options.name: custom
options.description: A custom styling overlying the default radio button.

options.name: return-object
options.description: If set to true, a full object will be returned in the model. By default only value is returned.
